description: The AOD is the effective depth of the aerosol column from the viewpoint of radiation propagation: Vertical column integral of spectral aerosol extinction coefficient AOD = exp(-K. Î”z) where K is the extinction coefficient [km-1 ] and Î”z the vertical path [km]
